description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis– Arrive at Appointments On Time Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1. What happens when you don't arrive on time for appointments? 1) Looks very unprofessional 2) Shows lack of interest 3) Shows disrespect for others' time 4) Careless attitude 5) People may stop respecting you 6) You may even lose your job, business or your clients 2. Why most people fail to arrive at appointments on time? 1) Lack of motivation 2) Time management problems 3) Stress or anxiety, because of which you fail to plan your events properly 4) Nervousness 3. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 3) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully
  • It is for those who have problems with time management and always arrive late for meetings, appointments and important gatherings causing embarrassment.

It is ideal for everyone who want to manage their time better and also overcome stress, depression , negativity and procrastination.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Arrive On Time

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis– Arrive at Appointments On Time Using Self Hypnosis
